TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BufferedWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider
Public MustInherit Class BufferedWebEventProvider Inherits WebEventProvider
public ref class BufferedWebEventProvider abstract : System::Web::Management::WebEventProvider

summary.span: 提供用于创建需要缓冲的事件提供程序的基本功能。

span.span: Provides the base functionality for creating event providers that require buffering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 如果你想要自定义运行状况事件处理，可以从派生类，以创建你自己的自定义缓冲提供程序。If you want to customize the health-event processing, you can derive from the class to create your own custom buffered provider. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关创建自定义提供程序的示例，请参阅[如何： 实现运行状况监视自定义提供程序示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c)。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类创建自定义提供程序，可将预先配置的事件写入到本地文件必须为其授予适当访问权限。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom provider that writes the configured events to a local file for which appropriate access rights must be granted. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#1)] 下面的配置文件的摘录部分演示`healthMonitoring`使 ASP.NET 可以使用上面定义来处理所有的运行状况监视事件的自定义提供程序的配置节。The following configuration file excerpt shows a `healthMonitoring` configuration section that enables ASP.NET to use the custom provider defined above to process all health-monitoring events. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 你不应使用它来实例化对象，但你在实现您自己的继承自此类的提供程序类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own provider type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义事件提供程序中使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor in a custom event provider. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BufferMode As String
public: property System::String ^ BufferMode { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个指示提供程序使用的缓冲模式的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the buffering mode used by the provider.
The name of the buffering mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含由定义值`bufferMode`属性中`providers`元素`healthMonitoring`部分。The property contains the value defined by the `bufferMode` attribute in the `providers` element of the `healthMonitoring` section. 下面的配置文件摘录演示如何在中定义的名称的缓冲区模式`healthMonitoring`部分。The following configuration-file excerpt shows how the name of the buffer mode should be defined in the `healthMonitoring` section. ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 将事件从提供程序缓冲区移到事件日志中。

span.span: Moves the events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用此方法时，缓冲区中的事件立即可以从缓冲区移动到的日志，而无论多少时间已经过去所有最后一次写入或多少事件是缓冲区中。When this method is called, all the events in the buffer are immediately moved from the buffer to the log, regardless of how much time has elapsed since last write or how many events are in the buffer. 最后一次写入时将重置为刷新操作的时间。The time of the last write is reset to the time of the flushing action. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 调用方法之后调用构造函数。ASP.NET calls the method after calling the constructor. 调用此方法以初始化的配置设置和配置文件中指定的名称。This method is called to initialize the with the configuration settings and name specified in the configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ProcessEvent(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent eventRaised) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ProcessEvent (eventRaised As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 处理传递给提供程序的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是，ASP.NET 运行状况监视功能可调用以启动事件的处理方法。This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start the processing of the event. 如果启用了缓冲，事件信息进行缓冲处理;否则，它将被调度到当前的日志记录机制。If buffering is enabled, the event information is buffered; otherwise, it is dispatched to the current logging mechanism. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 方法。The following code example shows how to implement the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessEventFlush(class System.Web.Management.WebEventBufferFlushInfo flushInfo) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub ProcessEventFlush (flushInfo As WebEventBufferFlushInfo)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法处理已缓冲的消息。The method processes the messages that have been buffered. 需要刷新缓冲区时，ASP.NET 运行状况监视调用的方法。ASP.NET health monitoring calls the method when the flushing of the buffer is required. 在间隔刷新由的参数值`bufferMode`属性中`providers`中的元素`healthMonitoring`配置节。The intervals at which flushing is required is determined by the parameter value of the `bufferMode` attribute in the `providers` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 方法。The following code example shows how to implement the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与关闭提供程序相关联的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 调用方法时托管 Web 应用程序的应用程序域终止。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain hosting the Web application terminates. 该方法调用以执行将允许应用程序，如关闭资源正常，结束的任务。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully, such as closing resources.
